name: The Emperor
Lore: 'Leader. Secretive manipulator of the galaxy. Played Darth Vader and Prince Xizor off against one another in his relentless pursuit of ''young Skywalker''.',
Text: 'Deploys only to Coruscant or Death Star II. Never moves to a site occupied by opponent (even if carried). If Vader or Xizor here, and Luke is not on table, adds 2 to attrition against opponent at other locations. Immune to attrition.',
